attributes.action: Introduce a zero tolerance for crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is it not time for the UK government to tackle Crime ? 

OAP's afraid to go out of their homes. anti-social behaviour out of control - judges giving out fines that are never paid.

Its time to take back our streets - send a message about crime zero tolerance !!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
